tokens.name: POKEMON / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:

- **Volatility (33.1% price change):** Medium volatility, so **-3% limit** (mid-range of -2% to -5%).  
- **Volume ($59k):** High volume → **+30% TP** (mid-range of +20% to +40%).  
- **Stop Loss:** Medium volatility → **-10% SL** (mid-range of -8% to -15%).  
- **Time Frame:** High volume + stable momentum → **4h** (mid-range of 4h to 1day).  
- **Decision:** Aggressive BUY with conservative parameters due to strong buying flow and medium volatility.
